website_summaries.verdict: Great for cooking for small family get-togethers, as well as for larger audiences. Double baskets are wonderful for making two dishes at a time
pros: Oil stays hot and baskets are strong
cons: Aftermath of cleanup might be tricky due to oil's drainage from baskets when holding up
Regulating gas flow could be tricky

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The fryer was perfect until the oil got hot and the pan had a small hole in it. This was disappointment to use a product for the first time at a family function and it’s faulty. It was the forth of July yesterday and we had to figure out how to get another basket or use the one small fryer from a few years ago. I want to know how to get another basket. If you buy this product try it before any functions. I would have put a 4 or 5 star but the pan had a hole which could help ave caused a huge grease fire.
customer_reviews.author: Very dissatisfied

customer_reviews.title: The pan and baskets are not the best quality, and I quickly replaced them with higher ...
customer_reviews.text: The pan and baskets are not the best quality, and I quickly replaced them with higher quality items, but the burner works as advertised and is cheaper than some other models with the same features.
customer_reviews.author: McFarland

customer_reviews.title: Good cooker to own
customer_reviews.text: The cooker worked great. I was able to cook two items at once with excellent heat recovery time. I have a big pot cooker but I liked this one better for fish and shrimp for a large crowd.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis E. Weldon

customer_reviews.title: Fry works great. I used this for a family reunion function ...
customer_reviews.text: Fry works great. I used this for a family reunion function and it did the job to feed approximately 100 people. The oil can make things a little messy.
customer_reviews.author: C. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Better for fish fries than a turkey cooker
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't at all sure that this would be big enough (compared to the turkey frier) for our family's fish fry. I shouldn't have worried. It heats up (and comes back to temp) quicker than the larger amount of oil that it requires. It was really nice just being able to lift the baskets to remove the food, rather than hunt around in the depths of the oil, too. Being able to separate foods between the two baskets is very handy. Happy that I made the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: KimberReads

customer_reviews.title: Best Priceworthy Fryer and Portable
customer_reviews.text: Best mini fryer out. Don't let the picture fool you. This is made to set on some type of bench, or stand. It's only a foot off the ground. That being said, it works great, and the 2 burner big sister fryer of this model that comes on a stand was overkill for the minimal usage it gets from me.
customer_reviews.author: Ben & Brittany

customer_reviews.title: ... last weekend during a fishing trip and it worked great. Right out of the box everything was easy ...
customer_reviews.text: We used this fryer for the first time last weekend during a fishing trip and it worked great. Right out of the box everything was easy to put together and it was done in under 10 minutes. While cooking, it kept the oil nice and hot and we were quickly able to cook up both fish and potatoes at the same time. Our regular campfire stove propane tanks ran out so we were left with only this cooker on the last day. We removed the frying pan and the surface worked great for putting a skillet on to fry up eggs and sausage.
customer_reviews.author: Dwain

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: This is just ok. The pilot keep blowing out, had to wrap the base with foil to create a closure from the small wind. The cooking oil temp just continues to rise and there really isn't a way besides turning the propane tank off and on to control the temp. It's really short as well so you'll have to bend over while cooking. If I could return it I would.
customer_reviews.author: CrisNN5

customer_reviews.title: Works great, super simple to set up
customer_reviews.text: Works great, super simple to set up. The only thing you put together is the handles on the frying baskets and that is it. Also comes with a thermometer so you can check the temperature of the oil.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NICE!
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift dor our son so he can cook his stinky fish outside & he loves it. Gets hot fast & keeps oil hot. \best one he's had.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Cain

customer_reviews.title: Great for a fish fry!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and use. Tried it out for a family fish fry. Husband had it turned up too high so the first batch was extra crispy. Dialed it down and the second batch was great! Worked out very well for my first fish fry.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Get this one!
customer_reviews.text: We have only used this once so far but it worked so good. We fried someone Oreos and other cookies. The baskets are very strong and the handles stay cool. It was very easy to assemble. We have a 20lb propane tank hooked up to it which seems to work better than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Halo Grace

customer_reviews.title: Great Fryer
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to a long time fryer of mostly fish. His last fryer wore out so this was a replacement for his birthday. He has only used it once but said it worked great. I don’t know about packaging, how sturdy, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Harry B.

customer_reviews.title: fry baby, fry
customer_reviews.text: Great fryer for family get togethers. Was slightly smaller than I was expecting, but still plenty large. Holds about 1.5gal of oil. Was able to cook 10lbs, of beer battered cod, 10lbs of handcut fries, and 5lbs of okra all in less than 30mins. Only complaint is when hanging the baskets up to drain a little oil will drip down the back side. But that is no big deal as you shouldn't be using this inside or near your house.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchel Hunley

customer_reviews.title: Awesome fryer!
customer_reviews.text: Great fryer! We used for a party and it was perfect for frying hush puppies and egg rolls! Small and easy to transport, but it does not breakdown smaller than what you see in the picture. I love that it came with a temperature gauge!
customer_reviews.author: Kim H.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Leave this product alone and spend the extra money on a better product ....will not keep a good temp...I put two fish fillets in the oil and took forever for the temp to recover ...from just 2 fillets!!!
customer_reviews.author: Garry E. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Works great! We've fried fish
customer_reviews.text: Works great! We've fried fish, fries, hush puppies and chicken wings in it. We fit about 6-8 fish fillets in each basket. It is short so it needs to be placed on a table. Only thing that would make it better is if it had a rubber lid to save grease without having to empty it after every use since at times we have used it a couple times in one weekend.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Leaks
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed with this fryer. I used it for the first time last weekend and the oil leaked out. It was right out of the box. Very dissatisfied. Only put a star because I had to. Reached out to the company but no response.
customer_reviews.author: Aschaller

customer_reviews.title: great fryer
customer_reviews.text: This works great. Does exactly what I need. Great product with a very good price. It's well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: oramacbs

customer_reviews.title: Works great for funnel cakes
customer_reviews.text: Bought specifically to cook funnel cakes in, worked out perfectly! Have also fried fish in it, that worked well also. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Lang

customer_reviews.title: Heat control is difficult
customer_reviews.text: The baskets are not sturdy enough especiaysince you have to put it together with the small screws it brings. The flame gauge is not very accurate and is easy to turn it off completely. Controlling the heat is very difficult
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Was damaged the first time it delivered, sent back and reordered. Came in damaged again.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Having LOTS OF FUN..
customer_reviews.text: ENJOYING ...Having LOTS OF FUN....family cook out treat....all of my church family wants to order on e also.. thank you so much
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cooker to host a seafood party for my daugther's high school graduation and it was fantastic!! I was able to cook a variety of foods for a large crowd without a long wait. Our guest really enjoyed the food and I didn't feel as if I spent the entire time preparing or serving. This is the way to go for your outdoor cooking!!
customer_reviews.author: harveylee

customer_reviews.title: Adequate..
customer_reviews.text: This whole product seems like an afterthought. The included thermometer is a joke as are the baskets and the main pan. The stand and burner are made well.
customer_reviews.author: saintly

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price and the size!
customer_reviews.text: Great small cooker! My husband bought it so he could fry fish and it works just great! Not as big as the one my step-dad has, but it is just the right size for a small fish fry. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: sheri59

customer_reviews.title: NICE PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I do a lot of French fries, wings, rocky mountain oysters, and this works excellent. VERY HAPPY
customer_reviews.author: outdoorsman76

customer_reviews.title: Works great for frying chicken or fries at a high school ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great for frying chicken or fries at a high school football concession stand. The temp stays hot and cooks fries and chicken fast. Gas is the way to go
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: a little more flimsy than expected but it did the ...
customer_reviews.text: a little more flimsy than expected but it did the job. It got hot enough and I was able to fry to my heart's content. I only wish it wasn't so low to the ground.
customer_reviews.author: gata1296

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a accident waiting to happen. Its ridiculously flimsy has no cover and has no way of shutting down when temperature as been reached. Had to purchase a different unit with a temperature control. Mabe good for some people but not for me
customer_reviews.author: The Bear

customer_reviews.title: Fish Cooker
customer_reviews.text: We love it, cooks really good. We cook fish a lot and this cooker gets everything to perfection and we can cook twice as fast with the double baskets.
customer_reviews.author: Wilma Bates

customer_reviews.title: Very nice unit
customer_reviews.text: Used at graduation party fish fry. Was easy, and precise with burner control. Cooked fish to perfection.
customer_reviews.author: Willie F. Orr

customer_reviews.title: Worked Great
customer_reviews.text: Not the most luxurious fryer out there, but it got the job done for our fish fry. I was able to fry up about 15 pounds of fish for beer battered fish tacos in 20 minutes. I could have easily fed 100+ per hour if necessary
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Curry

customer_reviews.title: In my opinion it's not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: It cooked good but after we got through and was cleaning it we found the bottom of the pan had three places that were almost burnt through. We returned it and will not buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: We just used the fryer for the first time this weekend cooking fish and other deep fried foods for a cookout. It worked wonderfully and we are happy with our purchase. The only thing that we were surprised with is that the stand is only as high as your knees. We thought it might be taller but when placed on a table it worked great and the perfect height.
customer_reviews.author: mende01

customer_reviews.title: A definite great sale
customer_reviews.text: Does the job, was able to fit 25 wing portions in one side while I cooked 3 bags of fries in the other side. Great for the price
customer_reviews.author: akeem

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best outdoor fryer we have used/purchased. Holds a good amount of food and is very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Travis

customer_reviews.title: Great for frying large amounts.
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a gift. Works great! Just wish I had gotten one with divided fryers so when cooking smaller amounts did not have to use so much oil.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great cooker, but cheap fry pans. I'm happy with this product! It made a great Father's Day gift!
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: I waited for a few uses to review and it has preformed perfect So easy to control the heat
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is I wished it was bigger and had taller legs. I waited for a few uses to review and it has preformed perfect So easy to control the heat
customer_reviews.author: Darrell

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cooker!
customer_reviews.text: Used this sucker to fry up some churros. Worked great!
customer_reviews.author: RAMIREZ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: easy set up and easy to use. Worked great for my fish fry. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Ann Swofford

customer_reviews.title: Great little cooker for the money did 10 lb of ...
customer_reviews.text: Great little cooker for the money did 10 lb of catfish in about 25 minutes and about 50 hush puppies
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Used many times. Cleans up nice and heats super hot
customer_reviews.author: Patricia L

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A great fryer.... have used it twice and is way better than a small electric unit.
customer_reviews.author: Maine Ah

customer_reviews.title: Great item, but the pan is a little thin
customer_reviews.text: Great item, but the pan is a little thin. It worked well for frying bread, but not sure if it could take much higher temps. Great package and deal though.
customer_reviews.author: Neil G

customer_reviews.title: This fryer is amazing. So glad I upgraded from the small
customer_reviews.text: This fryer is amazing. So glad I upgraded from the small, frustrating FryDaddy I had. Just made the best wings I have ever had in my life. The instructions have like 15 pages of caution and warnings but as long as you are not a moron you will be fine because it is extremely simple. 5 stars *****
customer_reviews.author: chris c

customer_reviews.title: Screws missing on handles!
customer_reviews.text: Works great as far as cooking. Screws that attach handles where missing. Therefor, be aware if you need to use it right away.
customer_reviews.author: StephanieHepler

customer_reviews.title: worked great 20 lbs wing
customer_reviews.text: worked great 20 lbs wing, onion ring ,cheese sticks unit is very sort. i put up on 8 inch blocks.
customer_reviews.author: john Willey

customer_reviews.title: I was satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: It work well, use it at a Fish Fry. I was satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like the setup
customer_reviews.text: I like the setup, it cooks great. The big drawback is it leaks oil at the handles on both sides.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Opened and damaged
customer_reviews.text: My package arrived today opened and damaged. This was a gift for my husband for Father’s Day. I am very disappointed. I will not be recommending
customer_reviews.author: Sherrell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the summer time fish fry! Love the double baskets. Best purchase ever.
customer_reviews.author: LDG

customer_reviews.title: Satusfied
customer_reviews.text: Love this product my husband didn’t think it would be the best and after using he said great purchase
customer_reviews.author: Melanie E.

customer_reviews.title: He loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a birthday present for our son-in-law. He loved it!
customer_reviews.author: LisaBinAR

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The cooker does a good job, but I wish the pan was a little thicker.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The set is a perfect combination, however
customer_reviews.text: The set is a perfect combination, however; after a couple of usages the screws came off one of the strainers, it was secured as instructed, but is now missing.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Moni

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Great product...used it for family reunion and the fish browned evenly, crispy and everyone enjoyed. The only thing I don't like is it was difficult to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Pam O.

customer_reviews.title: This fryer is great. I can't believe how well it holds up ...
customer_reviews.text: Don't think twice just buy it. This fryer is great. I can't believe how well it holds up and cleans up.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: King Kooker 1618 16-Inch Propane Outdoor
customer_reviews.text: You can crank out a ton of food with this thing highly recommended. Price is great hight i don't want any taller with all that hot oil pan is plenty big durable. Holds just under 2 gallon of oil I use peanut or rice bean oil to cook with prefer rice bean oil tho. Haves made chicken fish all sorts with it for our fishing trips to canada and minnesota crowd of 8 sometimes more.
customer_reviews.author: Heartland2011

customer_reviews.title: Great for cook outs
customer_reviews.text: Wasnt disappointed at all in this purchase. Great fish fryer
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Will get the job done
customer_reviews.text: Good cooker, decent pan and baskets. Thought it would be a little taller.
customer_reviews.author: Tim A.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely an excellent price
customer_reviews.text: Very nice item for the price. The shortening pan is a bit flemsy and it came bent at the handle so I hope the shortening does notleak. Definitely a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter Miller

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect for what we need it for
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for what we need it for. Cooks quick. I like the capacity of the two baskets. Cooking for a family of 4 is a breeze
customer_reviews.author: Jermie "JB" Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My mother loves cooking french fries and she loves frying fish.
customer_reviews.author: onebrenda

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive fryer cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: purchased two of these stoves. Used one and it was a nightmare trying to regulate the gas flow to maintain an even temperature between 350 - 375*. It could not be done and had to have my son constantly manually regulate the flow. Very disappointing. Not even worth returning the item. The unopened unit will be going back. The quality for the price matches, you get what you pay for and that was not really a concern. It was sturdy enough to handle what was being asked of it, the regulator/burner sucked. Sorry but that is the way it was.
customer_reviews.author: Badger

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works fine only wish I had ordered a two burner one, slow on recovery time.
customer_reviews.author: Walt Kiefer

customer_reviews.title: Nice stand/cooker for the money.  Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Works very nicely. It does exactly what it's supposed to do and is easy to use. No issues whatsoever. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Larry D Hunt

customer_reviews.title: This was perfect for my fish fry
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for my fish fry. The only issue was grease leaking off the baskets onto the ground when you sit the baskets on the edge of the fryer to drain.
customer_reviews.author: RITA

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this cooker for my step-dad for Father's Day and he loves it. He goes fishing a lot and loves to have fish fry's for the family. This was perfect for what he does. Really likes the 2 baskets so he can cook fish on one side and hushpuppies on the other. It was very easily setup and ready to go. If a person is looking for something they have to stand over this wouldn't be ideal,, but he enjoys sitting under the shade and frying them up and the height is perfect for that. Love this product.
customer_reviews.author: tonya

customer_reviews.title: Great Cooking!
customer_reviews.text: Bigger and better than I expected- no extra accessories needed except gas and oil. I cooked about 15 lbs of fries an hour at a Relay 4 Llife event Easily stores back in the box it came in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: Havent used it yet, but it looks great. Im sure it will be fine.
customer_reviews.author: BigCody

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product . Had my daughters birthday party and cooked 10 pounds of shrimp and 10 pounds of speckled trout . Food came out with a nice golden color nice and crispy.
customer_reviews.author: abel salazar

customer_reviews.title: It worked out just fine. Now my husband is eager to do another ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased for my husband for a fish fry get together we had at our house. It worked out just fine. Now my husband is eager to do another Fish Fry with this great fryer.
customer_reviews.author: Delmica Griggs

customer_reviews.title: worked wonderfully
customer_reviews.text: Had over 100 people ready to eat fish and the fryer worked wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Kimble

customer_reviews.title: it, s off the chain, I bought two ...
customer_reviews.text: it,s off the chain , I bought two of them one for fish ,and the other for chicken for my cookout
customer_reviews.author: PAUL JONES

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This thing works great for frying anything any everything, easy to clean up
customer_reviews.author: james p.

customer_reviews.title: Truly satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Yes I really liked this cooker, it worked great, I received a lot of compliments, and all my friends wanted to know where I purchased it!
customer_reviews.author: Myra H. Henderson

customer_reviews.title: but easily taken out of box
customer_reviews.text: Well packed, but easily taken out of box! Some assembly is required but, that is fairly easy also! Comes with 2 frying baskets, a low profile frying pot (not a turkey fryer), thermometer, and propane supply hose! Burner stand seems to be very sturdy... 4 stars because I just got it and have not used it yet!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Benson

customer_reviews.title: At first cooks good, but oil will burn too fast and burn ...
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't control temperature of oil. At first cooks good, but oil will burn too fast and burn the food.
customer_reviews.author: Janice K. Lacotta

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly and at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Bought just to cook fish, chicken and fried turkey! Works perfectly and at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela G. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Leaking pan.
customer_reviews.text: When the pan heats up it expands I guess and oil leaks out the sides. I think that might hazardous... However unit heats up nice and fast. It got the job done for 80 of my guest along with hush puppies. I would just like a better pan that doesn't leak.
customer_reviews.author: David R Blackmon

customer_reviews.title: Just Right
customer_reviews.text: This cooker was exactly what I was looking for. Excellent bang-for-your-buck. I wish it was a bit taller, but his product functions exactly as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: OldNorCalGuy

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!!
customer_reviews.text: This deep fryer was easy to assemble and great for cooking fish and fries!!! I am glad I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great buy yes I recomend the only thing that needs to change is the thermometer it is too short needs to be longer easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: David Duval

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love it, my family love it to, also easy to clean and put away
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle Napier

customer_reviews.title: Makes wings and fries PERFECT! Baskets are a bit on the cheap side ...
customer_reviews.text: Makes wings and fries PERFECT! Baskets are a bit on the cheap side but their OK for now. I can see myself replacing them soon. Otherwise for the money, you can't beat this product!
customer_reviews.author: Telzzz

customer_reviews.title: I like it, I need another pan for
customer_reviews.text: I like it , I need another pan for it
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Who's ready for fish?!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband from the kids so he could cook more fish at a time during family fish fry's. We haven't used it yet, but he liked it. The only thing, wish the stand was taller so we didn't have to put it on a table.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Roomy
customer_reviews.text: We use it all the time outside plenty of room to cook a large batch of fish and fries
customer_reviews.author: ms e

customer_reviews.title: Good Idea
customer_reviews.text: This is nice unit for small gatherings only wish it were some what taller can really put a strainer on your back if you're taller than 6', cooks really well.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Hank McCoy aka Beast

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: When arrived I was worried about the thinness and light weight cooking pan. Not to worry. With included thermometer, got oil, just under two gallons is best, to right temp and kept there. Cooked a bunch of catfish fillets, 5-7 oz., in three cookings. Did just great. Followed with 5 lbs. of french fries. Just right. Vary impressed with this cooker.
customer_reviews.author: Elbalawyer

customer_reviews.title: Very short
customer_reviews.text: It was assembled and looks just as pictured. I've not cooked in it yet, so I can't speak about that. It is very short and needs to be placed on a table for comfortable use. I'll update after cooking with it.
customer_reviews.author: GIGI

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Yes used it to feed about 20 guest prior to Thanksgiving outstanding would recommend to anyone who loves cooking outdoors as I do
customer_reviews.author: CM Marlowe

customer_reviews.title: Great cooker
customer_reviews.text: This was the exact tool I was looking for to bring my Back yard BBQ's to the next level!!! So many possibilities....
customer_reviews.author: Troy fagnan

customer_reviews.title: It Works Wonderfully!!!
customer_reviews.text: Please follow the instructions included with the product and have a great time cooking outside at your event! Very easy build, clean and received undamaged. Well worth the price and investment!
customer_reviews.author: REAL SHOPPER

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality of both baskets, and the fry pan. Wish I would have returned, but I'll see if it works ok during Tailgating season.
customer_reviews.author: J.Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Small but efficient
customer_reviews.text: I doesn't look like much but it works great and was perfect for our fish fry
customer_reviews.author: BRITTANY MCGRATH

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Box was definitely knocked around & busted up & needless to say the real thin pan was dented some & the baskets are also awful thin. But having two baskets & cook 2 different items at the same time is great !! Overall I would buy another one without thinking about it, just wish the pan & the baskets were a little more heavy duty.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Gano

customer_reviews.title: Backyard fryers
customer_reviews.text: We like to have 6-10 people over for backyard fish fry. For the money, this little cooker is awesome. Heats up quick and then it's fry fry fry. Love the small size for easy storage until our next fry.
customer_reviews.author: Creek Cottage
